item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 29, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 38C3: Illegal Instructions (232 points | 30 comments)
2. The Average American Spent 2.5 Months on Their Phone in 2024 (68 points | 53 comments)
3. Apple Photos phones home on iOS 18 and macOS 15 (828 points | 628 comments)
4. WebGL Fluid Simulation (169 points | 20 comments)
5. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (45 points | 1 comment)
6. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (257 points | 67 comments)
7. BioTerrorism Will Save Your Life with the 4 Thieves Vinegar Collective [video] (28 points | 6 comments)
8. We've not been trained for this: life after the Newag DRM disclosure [video] (197 points | 26 comments)
9. Where can you go in Europe by train in 8h? (520 points | 342 comments)
10. I automated my job application process (454 points | 644 comments)
11. Christmas Punch Requires a Formerly Forbidden Fruit (11 points | 3 comments)
12. Coupling nitrogen-vacancy center spins in diamond to a grape dimer (27 points | 11 comments)
13. I don't do Domain Driven Design (49 points | 10 comments)
14. An infinite DNA glitch saved millions [video] (29 points | 14 comments)
15. EmacsConf 2024 Notes (291 points | 101 comments)
16. Personal Mail Server on OpenBSD (2019) (90 points | 49 comments)
17. Fish 4.0: The Fish of Theseus (656 points | 117 comments)
18. Libsearch: Simple index-free full-text search for JavaScript (35 points | 7 comments)
19. 38C3: Blinkencity, radio controlling street lamps and power plants [video] (123 points | 22 comments)
20. Using AZs can eat up your budget – From Prometheus to VictoriaMetrics (3 points | discuss)
21. Bad keming: Kerning failures, plus other typographical and font mishaps (72 points | 15 comments)
22. Hello World on z/OS (2018) (56 points | 24 comments)
23. Guide to mechanical keyboards (141 points | 165 comments)
24. The Gambler Who Cracked the Horse-Racing Code (2018) (126 points | 52 comments)
25. Show HN: Anki AI Utils (149 points | 20 comments)
26. Carlsen disqualified from World Rapid and Blitz championship for wearing jeans (300 points | 371 comments)
27. NASA, Axiom Space Change Assembly Order of Commercial Space Station (77 points | 28 comments)
28. Finding and exploiting hidden features of Animal Crossing's NES emulator (2018) (95 points | 2 comments)
29. Numbers Are Leaves (224 points | 61 comments)
30. Joco almost died at launch. Now, it's a lifeline for e-bike delivery riders (85 points | 37 comments)
